body:
A few minutes ago, on Venomous TDM I got an insanely high killstreak, when Voseball told me I was invis. I actually thought I was doing good for once and got sad :(

Share your let down moments :D
body_tagged:
A few minutes ago, on Venomous TDM I got an insanely high killstreak, when Voseball told me I was invis. I actually thought I was doing good for once and got sad :(

Share your let down moments :D
title: Let Down Moments

replies.body: That's terrible xD, and mine was probably when I was learning to ninja bridge and the match ended as soon as I was starting to do really good :P
replies.body_tagged: That's terrible xD, and mine was probably when I was learning to ninja bridge and the match ended as soon as I was starting to do really good :P

replies.body:
Raptuous thats what happened to me. I thought I was going well…
And also when i had full diamond and someone knocks me off the world :(

replies.body: I was logging in to avicus, for another day of DTM and walls, when a dialog came up. Banned for ban evading(izjust4haxM81v1). Hax was my friend who had been living with our family for 2 months as his college was around here. I woke him up and he said that he trolled me and got us ip banned. I have not spoken to him since and he left. The end. :(

I have not spoken to him since and he left. The end. :(

replies.body:
I once nearly got all 3 monuments on a map.
I got the first two relatively easy, only having to kill one defender. I then go to the third, where I go in and kill a defender.
Feeling really MLG, I go to destroy the monument, I have about a second left when a team mate comes and mon-blocks me, so I ask him what he was doing in chat, and he gets the monument.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: The one moment I'll never live up was when I got rekt by Taco in a 1v1. He was in the ordinary starter armour. I was in full diamond.

replies.body:
Hm. In real life, when I'm having a big private discussion with my friend in the hall, then I realise my friend is behind me and I'm talking to some random ;-;

In MC, I don't really have them much, since its just a game I don't get into it as much as others.

EDIT: When I was one jump away from completing the parkour, then the hub restarted.
